articles.author: Kalyan Parbat, Kala Vijayraghavan, Saikat Das, ET Telecom
articles.title: Vodafone Group, Aditya Birla Group may infuse fresh equity into Vodafone Idea - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Vi’s co-promoters, in fact, are believed to have committed to the government that they will take all necessary steps to ensure Vi is revived. Till date, they had stuck to their stance not to put in any fresh equity in the loss-making telco.
articles.content: Kolkata | Mumbai: UKs Vodafone Plc and Aditya Birla Group are considering all options, including putting in some fresh equity into Vodafone Idea (Vi), to further build on the recent relief package an… [+4426 chars]
